# STL  

基本数据结构的STL

## 数组

:::code-group

```cpp
vector<int> a(size,val);
*a.begin()==a.front();
*a.end()==a.back();
a.empty();
a.size();
a.clear();
a.push_back(1);
a.pop_back();
```

```py
a=[i for i in range(10)]
print(a[0],a[-1])
a.append(10)
print(a)
a.pop()
print(a)
```

:::
